metadata.title: CVE-2018-20592 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Mini-XML (aka mxml) v2.12, there is a use-after-free in the mxmlAddfunction of the mxml-node.c file. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted xml file, asdemonstrated by mxmldoc.

criterions.comment: mxml package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
